DOC.brief_title: Canadian Aesthetic Experience With Sculptra Therapy
DOC.criteria: Present nasolabial fold , mid lower facial volume loss , jawline laxity sign facial age treat Sculptra The subject must willing able provide write informed consent include release use photographs publication . Subjects refuse photo release eligible participate study . Female subject must postmenopausal least one year hysterectomy tubal ligation ; childbearing potential , must agree use approve method birth control throughout study ( i.e. , oral/systemic contraceptive , intrauterine device ( IUD ) , spermicide combination barrier method contraception ) ; Personal history allergic/anaphylactic reaction , include hypersensitivity local anaesthetic ( lidocaine ) ; Known history bleed disorder ; Active inflammatory process area treat ( skin eruption cyst , pimple , rash , cancerous/precancerous lesion , active skin disease ) ; Active hepatitis within past year ; Subjects pregnant plan become pregnant within study timeframe , breastfeeding ; HIV positive patient ; Recent history trauma face ( < 1 year ) ; Previous use Dermalive Dermadeep ; Previous facial surgery within last six month ; Recent facial filler within last six month ; Planned surgical intervention ( rhinoplasty , facelift , congenital defect repair ) use filler laser initial six month postSculptra therapy ; Subjects clinically important disease judge investigator within 3 month start study ( e.g. , history significant lab abnormality , myocardial infarct , stroke , cancer , connective tissue disease , etc . ) , include subject medical condition might require use immunosuppressive medication trial ( severe asthma , rheumatoid arthritis , organ transplant , etc . ) ; Subjects use superficial dermal resurfacing procedure facial area , include chemical peel , dermabrasion , microderm treatment within six week visit 1 duration main study .
